oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Foreign wove paper, made in Austria (1889) and England (1890) for Shaikh Ahmad Shaikh Dawood of Bombay.
Written in black ink, 11 lines per page.
Single section laced into cover board; half-cloth covering with marble paper.
Pages slightly discolored; otherwise no significant damage.
Folio 1 marked with thew name "Hushen" in Gujarati script.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
